artist: Engraver: Hendrick Bary; Painter: After G. ter Burg
description: three quarter view; subject looking PR; hat with feathers; full sleeves; fabric wound around PL hand
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate below image in black: [Me Licet hand vincat Cyntherea, Senecta colores/ Quam cito me febres et Libitina rapit:/ CB/ G. ter Burg pinx  1-86(in pencil)  H. Bary sculp]; on mount in pencil: [Hollstein 13 ii/ii]
title: Portrait of Cyntherea Serfecta
